resultType.name: UpdateTransactionResult
resultType.description: This class defines a container that enables the SE-API function updateTransaction to return informations about the updated transaction(s).

field.name: performedUpdateProtection
field.description: Represents the performed protections action (noPrevPassedInMem, noPrevPassedProtected, prevAndPassedInMem, prevAndPassedProtected, prevProtectedPassedInMem, prevProtectedPassedProtected).

field.name: firstLogSignatureCreationTime
field.description: If one or two log messages were created, the value represents the point in time of the Secure Element when the first created log message was signed.

field.name: firstLogSignatureValue
field.description: If one or two log messages were created, the value represents the signature value of the first created log message.

field.name: firstLogSignatureCounter
field.description: If one or two log messages were created, the value represents the value of the signature counter of the first created log message.

field.name: secondLogSignatureCreationTime
field.description: If two log messages were created, the value represents the point in time of the Secure Element when the second created log message was signed.

field.name: secondLogSignatureValue
field.description: If two log messages were created, the value represents the signature value of the second created log message.

field.name: secondLogSignatureCounter
field.description: If two log messages were created, the value represents the value of the signature counter of the second created log message.
